Description:
Detects changes to the "HVCIDisallowedImages" registry value to potentially add a driver to the list, in order to prevent it from loading.


Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), Omar Khaled (@beacon_exe)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Driver Added To Disallowed Images In HVCI - Registry
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where (target_object like '%\control\ci\%' and target_object like '%\hvcidisallowedimages%')
